title: Luxury All-Inclusive Private Island Resort
description: Experience world-renowned barefoot luxury at Asia's ultimate all-inclusive private island paradise where you can enjoy unlimited food and alcoholic beverages 24 hours a day. Spend five nights at the ultra-exclusive island hideaway of Song Saa resort in Cambodia with unlimited breakfasts, lunches, snacks and dinners plus unlimited alcoholic house beverages and non-alcoholic beverages, complimentary daily minibar, unlimited room service, return car and speedboat transfers, complimentary snorkelling, kayaking and sailing and more for two.
offer_address: Koh Ouen Private Island, Koh Rong Archipelago, Near Sihanoukville, Cambodia
